verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> [as] an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Sosthenes <S%G4988><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%>

to the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is at Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> to those who have been sanctified <S%G37><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> by calling, <S%G2822><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> who in every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> call <S%G1941><s%> upon the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> their [Lord] and ours: <S%G1473><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I thank <S%G2168><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> you, for the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> you in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>
that in everything <S%G3956><s%> you were enriched <S%G4148><s%> in Him, in all <S%G3956><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%>
even <S%G2531><s%> as the testimony <S%G3142><s%> concerning Christ <S%G5547><s%> was confirmed <S%G950><s%> in you,

so <S%G5620><s%> that you are not lacking <S%G5302><s%> in any <S%G3367><s%> gift, <S%G5486><s%> awaiting <S%G553><s%> eagerly <S%G553><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> confirm <S%G950><s%> you to the end, <S%G5056><s%> blameless <S%G410><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you were called <S%G2564><s%> into fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with His Son, <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%> you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> by the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that you all <S%G3956><s%> agree, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004><s%> and there be no <S%G3361><s%> divisions <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, but you be made <S%G2675><s%> complete <S%G2675><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and in the same <S%G846><s%> judgment. <S%G1106><s%>
For I have been informed <S%G1213><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> you, my brethren, <S%G80><s%> by Chloe's [people,] that there are quarrels <S%G2054><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I mean <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> that each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> of you is saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul, <S%G3972><s%>" and "I of Apollos, <S%G625><s%>" and "I of Cephas, <S%G2786><s%>" and "I of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>"

Has Christ <S%G5547><s%> been divided <S%G3307><s%>? Paul <S%G3972><s%> was not crucified <S%G4717><s%> for you, was he? Or <S%G2228><s%> were you baptized <S%G907><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of Paul <S%G3972><s%>?
I thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that I baptized <S%G907><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of you except <S%G1508><s%> Crispus <S%G2921><s%> and Gaius, <S%G1050><s%>
that no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> should say <S%G3004><s%> you were baptized <S%G907><s%> in my name. <S%G3686><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I did baptize <S%G907><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the household <S%G3624><s%> of Stephanas; <S%G4734><s%> beyond <S%G3062><s%> that, I do not know <S%G3609><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> other. <S%G243><s%>

For Christ <S%G5547><s%> did not send <S%G649><s%> me to baptize, <S%G907><s%> but to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> not in cleverness <S%G4678><s%> of speech, <S%G3056><s%> that the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> should not be made <S%G2758><s%> void. <S%G2758><s%>

For the word <S%G3056><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> is to those <S%G3588><s%> who are perishing <S%G622><s%> foolishness, <S%G3472><s%> but to us who are being saved <S%G4982><s%> it is the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "I will destroy <S%G622><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the wise, <S%G4680><s%> And the cleverness <S%G4907><s%> of the clever <S%G4908><s%> I will set <S%G114><s%> aside. <S%G114><s%>"

Where <S%G4226><s%> is the wise <S%G4680><s%> man <S%G4680><s%>? Where <S%G4226><s%> is the scribe <S%G1122><s%>? Where <S%G4226><s%> is the debater <S%G4804><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> age <S%G165><s%>? Has not God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G3471><s%> foolish <S%G3471><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>?

For since <S%G1894><s%> in the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> its wisdom <S%G4678><s%> did not [come to] know <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was well-pleased through <S%G1223><s%> the foolishness <S%G3472><s%> of the message <S%G2782><s%> preached <S%G2782><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who believe. <S%G4100><s%>
For indeed <S%G2532><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> ask <S%G154><s%> for signs, <S%G4592><s%> and Greeks <S%G1672><s%> search <S%G2212><s%> for wisdom; <S%G4678><s%>
but we preach <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> crucified, <S%G4717><s%> to Jews <S%G2453><s%> a stumbling <S%G4625><s%> block, <S%G4625><s%> and to Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> foolishness, <S%G3472><s%>

but to those <S%G3588><s%> who are the called, <S%G2822><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> the foolishness <S%G3474><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is wiser <S%G4680><s%> than men, <S%G444><s%> and the weakness <S%G772><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is stronger <S%G2478><s%> than men. <S%G444><s%>

For consider <S%G991><s%> your calling, <S%G2821><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that there were not many <S%G4183><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> not many <S%G4183><s%> mighty, <S%G1415><s%> not many <S%G4183><s%> noble; <S%G2104><s%>

but God <S%G2316><s%> has chosen <S%G1586><s%> the foolish <S%G3474><s%> things <S%G3474><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> to shame <S%G2617><s%> the wise, <S%G4680><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> has chosen <S%G1586><s%> the weak <S%G772><s%> things <S%G772><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> to shame <S%G2617><s%> the things which <S%G2478><s%> are strong, <S%G2478><s%>

and the base <S%G36><s%> things <S%G36><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> and the despised, <S%G1848><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has chosen, <S%G1586><s%> the things that are not, that He might nullify <S%G2673><s%> the things that are,
that no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G4561><s%> should boast <S%G2744><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But by His doing you are in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> to us wisdom <S%G4678><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> and righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and sanctification, <S%G38><s%> and redemption, <S%G629><s%>
that, just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Let him who boasts, <S%G2744><s%> boast <S%G2744><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>"
